-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a part of the 10cd+2DVD box The Freddie Mercury Solo Collection

Part I: The Albums
           CD01 Mr. Bad Guy
           CD02 Barcelona

Part II: The Singles
           CD04 The Singles 1973-1985
           CD05 The Singles 1986-1993

Part III: Rarities
           CD06 Rarities I (Mr. Bad Guy Sessions)
           CD07 Rarities II (Barcelona Sessions)
           CD08 Rarities III (Other Sessions)

Part IV: Remixes, Instrumentals and Interviews
           CD03 The Great Pretender
           CD09 Instrumentals
           CD10 David Wigg Interviews

Part V: The Video Collection (H.264/AC3 DVDRip)

Part VI: The Untold Story (H.264/AC3 DVDRip)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The rip has been done using EAC to extract .wav files, and dBPowerAmp to convert 
them into Level-8 FLAC files. Log files are enclosed.

The CDs are presented as ONE SINGLE LONG AUDIO FILE for each CD. There&#039;s also a 
.cue file which marks the track points. If you need to extract a single song 
from this, you must download the whole album, and use a tool like Medieval Cue 
Splitter for Windows, or X Lossless Decoder (XLD) for Mac Users. I don&#039;t know 
any specific software for Linux users, if you do, tell me so I can add that info 
on future releases.

Attention: Single .cue/FLAC files. That&#039;s simply my personal choice for 
releasing it, don&#039;t argue about it, thanks. IF you don&#039;t like it, you&#039;ve been 
clearly told, so look somewehere else and don&#039;t come crying. It&#039;s free, ok? Take 
it as it comes.

The remaining CDs will come shortly.  After that, we&#039;ll go for the Official 
Queen Discography

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
